name: Jet Rats
description:
Jet Rats is a free-to-play game in which you control rats on jetpacks fighting waves of robots. 

Find scraps and ability cards to upgrade your characters!

Use the abilities of Nikola Tes'rat and Thom'rat Edison to defeat the army of robots that tries to destroy their lab!

And more importantly... have fun!

Project members: Alric PRED'HOMME, Loïc BURTRE, Ludovic GIOVANNETTI, Malo GUYON, Maxime BESSEAU, Alexandre BLONTROCK, Yang YI
